[DQR.IFRS.0101.9535] The concept ifrs-full:OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsOperatingActivities appears in the investing cash flows of the company's cash flow statement. ifrs-full:OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsOperatingActivities is an operating item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow generated from operating activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9535 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 13,764,983,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 11,817,337,000 + 811,001,000 ) with a value of 12,628,338,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Income statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 08 - Statement of cash flows includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 14,648,121,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 14,648,125,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 14,648,121,000 are comprised of the following:
+ FinancialAssetsAtAmortizedCost -4,192,766,000 + FinancialAssetsAtDesignatedFairValueThroughProfitLoss 1,804,752,000 + FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome -78,644,000 + FinancialAssetsHeldForTrading -74,950,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortizedCost 15,420,576,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesAtDesignatedFairValueThroughProfitLoss -186,021,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesHeldForTrading 199,505,000 + NonTradingFinancialAssetsAtMandatorilyFairValueThroughProfitLoss -45,778,000 + OtherAssets 45,516,000 + OtherLiabilities -61,177,000 + ProvisionsForLiabilitiesAndCharges -153,895,000 + AdjustmentsForReconcileProfitLoss -838,856,000 + DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 78,692,000 + IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -340,687,000 + InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -1,304,720,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 4,376,578,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 08 - Statement of cash flows. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : 14,648,121,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/9ZHRYM6F437SQJ6OUG95/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/RBI.zip/RBI/reports/RBI-2020-12-31.xhtml 56627

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 08 - Statement of cash flows includes an inconsistent calculation. The sum of these child components is 14,648,125,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 14,648,121,000 are comprised of the following:
+ FinancialAssetsAtAmortizedCost -4,192,766,000 + FinancialAssetsAtDesignatedFairValueThroughProfitLoss 1,804,752,000 + FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome -78,644,000 + FinancialAssetsHeldForTrading -74,950,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortizedCost 15,420,576,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesAtDesignatedFairValueThroughProfitLoss -186,021,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesHeldForTrading 199,505,000 + NonTradingFinancialAssetsAtMandatorilyFairValueThroughProfitLoss -45,778,000 + OtherAssets 45,516,000 + OtherLiabilities -61,177,000 + ProvisionsForLiabilitiesAndCharges -153,895,000 + AdjustmentsForReconcileProfitLoss -838,856,000 + DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 78,692,000 + IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -340,687,000 + InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -1,304,720,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 4,376,578,000
